lines.text: SUMMARY
Stacy Bradford
Los Angeles, CA 90027 | 415.483.5794 | StacyDBradford@gmail.com
linkedin.com/in/stacy-bradford

Technically proficient Solutions Engineer with extensive experience in sales, data-driven strategies, and API integrations. Passionate about enabling companies to harness the power of AI technologies to drive business success. A strong communicator with hands-on experience in Python, API development, and delivering pre-sales support to a diverse set of customers, from startups to enterprise-level organizations. Proven success in leading cross-functional teams, crafting innovative solutions, and optimizing client relationships.
ACCOMPLISHMENTS
• Developed and implemented Python-based custom Go-To-Market strategies that leveraged API integrations for SMB and enterprise clients.
• Delivered technical presentations and product demos that clarified complex technical concepts and secured new business for Indiegogo.
• Led cross-functional teams that unlocked over $1.25M+ in additional revenue through innovative technical solutions.
• Created and scaled an enterprise sales channel at RangeMe targeting Fortune 500 companies, including solutions-based selling and API integrations.
• Achieved 9x YoY customer growth featured in Forbes through a strategic growth initiative.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Senior Strategic Account Executive – Indiegogo, Remote                                                                           September 2021-Present
• Implemented affiliate and partnership programs that extended Indiegogo’s reach while increasing account retention
• Provided technical support to clients, helping them understand and implement API-based solutions for their unique business needs
• Collaborated with engineering teams to translate customer needs into product features and functionality
Interim Director of Sales – Indiegogo, Remote                                                                         December 2021– September 2022
• Managed a 10+ person sales team, ensuring technical accuracy in pre-sales presentations and API integrations
• Drove initiatives to improve Salesforce data integrity and forecasting accuracy
Strategic Account Executive – Indiegogo, San Francisco                                                              August 2019 – September 2021
• Led company growth initiative resulting in 9x YoY customer gains and 145% YoY increase in revenue
Enterprise Sales Representative – RangeMe, San Francisco                                                               November 2017 – August 2019
• Established enterprise sales channel by instituting playbook with scalable processes targeting Fortune 500 companies
SKILLS
• Sales Methodologies: SANDLER, MEDDIC, GAP, SPIN, BANT, Challenger, Consultative Selling, Technical Sales
• Technical Skills: Python, API Development, Salesforce, Complex Sales, Contract Negotiation
• Sales Skills: Lead Generation, Customer Success, Strategic Sales, Cross-Sell, Upsell, Closing
• Other: Go-To-Market Strategy, Market Research, Product Knowledge, Looker, Tableau, Excel
EDUCATION
• Bachelor of Science - Zoology | University of Oklahoma, Norman, OK
